obojangle wrote:

<snip />
> Has anyone run into a similar scenario?  Any thoughts on the best
> way to change the name dynamically.

Don't change the name dynamically. It looks like you want a 
Parameterized Test Case. If you only have one test method to execute for 
1000 rows of data, then just override runTest() in your TestCase class, 
then you can name the test (using setName()) however you like.
